name: rych/phpass
description: PHP Password Library: Easy, secure password management for PHP

suggest.ext-openssl: The OpenSSL extension is used as the default source of cryptographically strong random data.
suggest.ext-mcrypt: The Mcrypt extension is used as a source of cryptographically strong random data in the absence of ext-openssl.
suggest.ext-hash: Some modules may require the HASH Message Digest Framework extension to be loaded in order to work.
